description.string: This service returns a list of citations.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Region 2 letter abbrev or ID of requesed region.

parameters.name: regressionregions
parameters.description: Comma separated list of regression region ID's or code parameters to limit citation list.

parameters.name: statisticgroups
parameters.description: Comma separated list of statistic group ID's or code parameters to limit citation list.

parameters.name: regressiontypes
parameters.description: Comma separated list of regression type ID's or code parameters to limit citation list.
